1.content:
Charles Zamboni sat in his office pondering life. Hmmmm he thought to himself as he stroked his stereotypical long mustache and beard. What a weird life I have led so far. Growing up in "Hells Kitchen in New York City. Then saving all the money I could earn to travel the Himalayas and study the art of hypnosis from master Q. All those years at the feet of a master Like Q.
Now here I am in this little town as a family therapist. Oh the fun of hypnotizing that clerk at the state office into giving me a license to practice. Practice tomfoolery laughed Zamboni in the typical bad guy laugh we have all heard before. Just then a beep went off in Zambonis office. An office that the hypnotist tricked a real therapist into believing had a heating problem. "The Clarks are here to see you," the intercom buzzed. Zamboni stood. He was a tall man, a dark man, the kind of man that oozes villain. He wore a black suit with a black tie and white shirt. His hair was brushed back and slick.

On his face was the traditional goatee and in his ear was a gold earring. Zamboni stood behind his desk and adjusted his tie and pulled down his jacket. "Send in the victi...I mean the family," Zamboni coughed. The Clarks entered.

There was Jake the teenage son. Typical teenager age 15. He wore a wife beater t-shirt and baggy jeans. He has on a baseball cap turned backwards. Then there was Cyndi she was 11 years old and had on some capri length pants, flip-flops, and a pink shirt with capped sleeves. The father walked in next. His name was George and he was an average sized person. He was around 5'8, slim and well groomed. He had on a button down shirt and a pair of brown loafers.

Next was his wife Shelly. Very pretty and well kept. She was wearing a denim mini-skirt,3 inch mules and had shoulder length brown hair. She was wearing a white blouse with gold earrings in her ear. Zamboni welcomed the family in and they all sat on Zambonis black leather couch.

Shelly was the first to speak. " Dr. my family is having issues. We just can't seem to see eye to eye anymore." The supposed Doctor could see that Shelly was upset. He nodded and signaled for Shelly to continue.

" Well for instance every time I ask my son Jake to help around the house it always turns into such an argument." Zamboni looked over at the young man and could see him stiffen at his mother's comments. Then George patted his wives arm and took over the narrative.

" Jake isn't the only issue either dear. Cyndi's grades have been slipping ever since you allowed her to have that damn iphone." Shelly's face blanched and she looked over at her husband. Then Cyndi jumped in. " Dad you have no idea what it is like being my age do you know how hard it is to have a dad who is a manager at McDonalds, I mean like I am so embarrassed." Then Jake jumped in and pretty soon the family was in a total argument.

Zamboni put his two fingers to his lips and whistled loudly. The shrill sound caused the family to stop and look at him. " My good people I think I know just how to help." Zamboni pulled out a long golden chain. Attached to the chain was an old watch. " Everyone look over here." Then Zamboni started to swing the watch and the family concentrated very hard.
What does Zamboni do?

He was supposed to catch it however...but missed, and the watch went flying over him and knocked a vase off a small table nearby, smashing it. "Damn it!" he grumbled. He buzzed on his intercom: "Jeanne can you bring a dustpan and brush in please, there's been a slight mishap, nothing to worry about".

He then walked over and retrieved his watch and chain, before glancing back at the entranced family sat before him. "Haha, marvelous, a passing freight train couldn't even wake them!" he laughed maniacally, before stopping abruptly and looking around. As with all 'unbalanced' scientists and professors, Zamboni was 'slightly' paranoid.

"That will be all Jeanne!" Zamboni uttered to his receptionist, who showed an interest in the family when she came in to clean up. As the woman scurried out of the room, Zamboni thought what to do to 'help' this troubled family out.

"Hmmm!" he sighed deeply, "Ahh...I know!" he then exclaimed. He knew that what he had in mind maybe not be particularly helpful, but it would be definitely be amusing. And he did love a good laugh...at other's expense.

Zamboni....

1123122122.content:
After therapy, the car ride home was mostly silent. Throughout their sessions, Zamboni had told the family of three to see things from each other’s perspectives, but it just seemed impossible for the two daughters and mother. So, Zamboni decided to try drastic something a bit more drastic…

Once home, Miss Pam Littleton finally asked, “Out of all the boys, you want to date him?” Often, Zamboni would note of Pam’s distrust in men resulting from her divorce.

“Mom, I love Mike, and he loves me, why can’t you just be happy for me?” the 19-year-old Skylar Littleton replied. Zamboni believed she was trying to grow up too fast and often urged Skylar to enjoy her youth.

“Why can’t you just be happy for me?” her kid sister Zoe Littleton imitated. After a stern look from Skylar, Zoe scurried off. Unlike her sister, Zamboni noted that Zoe was far too immature and needed to do some growing up.

“You are so unbearable!” Skylar gave a frustrated sigh. “He’s going to be here any minute, please try not to embarrass me!”

Pam opened the door and saw Mike holding flowers. “Hey, Mrs. Littleton, These are for you.”

“Why thank you, Mike, I will take them off your hands.” He can't win me over that easily, she thought.

Skylar and Mike hugged each other but kept it PG as they knew others would be watching.

Things were awkward as the four of them sat around the living room waiting for dinner to be ready. Skylar sat next to her boyfriend, giving worried glances hoping he wouldn’t hate her because of her family.

“Do you like to kiss my big sister?” Zoe said giggling and making kissy faces.

“Young lady!” Pam chastised.

Zoe looked down. “Sorry, mummy” she squeaked out.

After a long pause, Mike finally uttered, “Food smells great”. Suddenly, all three girls seemed to daze out. Then, Zoe spoke up, “Thank you, it should be ready any moment!” Zoe's words were much colder than usual.

Mike noticed from across the room that Mrs. Littleton was looking lovingly at him and twirling her hair. Guess the flowers worked, he thought.

Zoe went up to finish preparing the meal. She gave Mike a stern look as she left.

After Zoe left the room, Mike noticed his girlfriend making funny faces at her mom. ‘Stop, babe” he whispered. “What are you doing?”

Skylar froze again. Then she came to. “What?” she asked.

“I said stop,” Mike said a little louder this time.

Pam now froze. When she came to, she was back to glaring at Mike. There was a crash from the kitchen.

“Mommy, I need help” Zoe called from the kitchen.

“What on earth?” Pam cried out. “Sweetie, leave the cooking to grown-ups”

Zoe skipped out of the kitchen, licking the pasta sauce off her fingers.

“Ugh, you are disgusting,” Skylar told her little sister.

“But I was hungry” Zoe whined.

'My my, what an interesting family. Perhaps some things can be changed around a bit' thought Zomboni.

Clearly, he saw the disfunction in the family right now. They could use some new perspectives on things.

"Mom, I bet your job isn't even that hard" smirked Jake, getting his mom's attention.

"That's no way to act, young man. You don't know how much effort I put into maintaining this family" said Shelly, getting a confirming nod from George.

"Sometimes, I wish a cat instead of a brother" remarked Cyndi. Jake glared at her.

"A cat would be more useful than you are" remarked Jake, smirking. Cyndi glared at him and began arguing with Jake again.

"There they go again" muttered George.

"This is going nowhere" muttered Shelly.

"Attention!" yelled Zomboni, getting the family to be quiet. "That is quite enough. There is no further need to argue. My job is to help those in need. Please sit down so we may begin" he said in a polite manner. The family obediently sat down, an air of tension still around them.

"Now, focus on me!" said Zomboni, snapping his fingers. At that, the family became entranced and didn't speak a word. Their attention was solely on Zomboni.

"Good, good. Now where to begin?" snickered Zomboni. This family was in for quite the experience over the next week or so. That was for sure.
12.title: Changes things around

121.content:
"All right, let's begin"said Zomboni, looking at the family. Their heads slowly nodded, hardly listening to anything he was really saying. The sound of a train couldn't break them out of that trance.

"Very well, let's start with you, Jake" said Zomboni. He moved closer to Jake, and his eyes began to follow the singing chain Zomboni had.

"You are quite sure that your mother has things easy. Maybe she does, maybe she doesn't. You should learn for yourself what a mother like her has to go through. You will slowly dedicate yourself to acting like a mother should, preparing yourself in the right way of course. When you get home, try cooking for your family and make them feel welcome. Try one some of your mom's clothes and try to see the world like a mother should" said Zomboni. Jake nodded, and Zomboni then walked over to Shelly.

"As for you Shelly, the life of a teenager is rough, especially for a boy. You should learn your son's life and what he goes through on a daily basis. Take a break from your hard work as a mother and enjoy yourself for once. Put on your son's clothes and try to let yourself loose for once." said Zomboni, getting a nod from Shelly. He then walked over to George.

"George, you didn't have that good of a life growing up. Your siblings always getting better things than you and everything. Your little daughter has quite the life and you should learn it better if you want to forge a better relationship with her. Try something like taking a bath or watching her kind of TV shows. Maybe even try one of her dresses" said Zomboni, getting a small nod from George.

Zomboni then walked over to Cyndi. Initially, he was going to change her into an older man to complete the set. However, her quote about wantinga cat over a brother gave him an idea.

"Cyndi, you really like pets, right? It's unfortunate that you don't have one. You'd like the idea of having a cat in your home, correct? Well, if you want a cat, you should try to get inside the head of one. Try to see things from their view and show that your home is a good one for a cat. When you get home, try some of their food if you can. Perhaps even try sleeping on the floor. It will help" said Zomboni, getting a nod from Cyndi as well.

"That is what all of you should do. Once this is over, you will feel the need to come back for our next session next Sunday" said Zomboni, knowing that today was Sunday.

At that, he snapped his fingers again, bringing the family back to their senses.

"Finally!" George exclaimed, rolling his eyes and jumping up out of his chair.

"You don't owe me anything, think of it as a free lesson" he replied. He omitted the part about him getting all he wanted out of the session, the manipulation of others. "Well, it just so happens I don't like what I'm wearing either. What possessed me to put these 'things' on today I don't know!" Jake responded, pulling on his own clothes. Tell you what sweetie," he then said, "there's an empty room over there, we can exchange clothes and we'll both be happier" he added.

"Cool!" his mother grunted.

The drive home was uneventful.

"OK, Ma," Sarah said. "I know you have something to tell me. You are being too nice."

"I'm always nice," Sarah quipped. "But you know me too well. I have been thinking and the therapist is right. I want to get a new job. I want to find a new apartment. I want to find a woman and get married. I have been here too long. It's time to move on!"

"I know. I think the doctor is right. I just want to say that it was all my fault."

"Your fault?"

"Yes son. After your father died I just felt so lonely. I knew I should have encouraged you to go on, but I just couldn't do it."

"I could have left if I wanted to. It wasn't your fault."

"But a mother should do what is best for her son." Ben said with emotion in his voice. "I didn't do that. I should have kicked you out long ago. I shouldn't have let you stay so long."

"Mom, it wasn't your fault," Sarah insisted. The two stood up and hugged each other. They both knew that this was a turning point in their relationship and in their own lives. Both would move on from here.

Ben would stop acting like an old lady. He would fix himself up. Buy new fashionable apparel (clothes appropriate for a middle aged woman). He knew he wasn't a young girl anymore, he would need help to look good. He knew he would need a padded girdle to whip his butt into shape. He would also have to find a padded bra to help with his little girls on top. He might need a corset to put it all together too. He didn't care that it might be uncomfortable. The pain would be worth it. He would also start wearing makeup all the time. He didn't quite remember all the tricks he used to know, but he was sure there would be tutorials on the Internet. He would start to look for new mature friends. He wanted people to go out with. People who liked the same things as he liked. The same 'old' movies and he had always liked crafts. he didn't know when he quit but he would start anew. But even more than that card games and socializing with the ladies sounded like so much fun. He wanted to live again. The best years were a head of him. Just because you belong to AARP doesn't mean you are ready for the retirement home and death. If all went well he would find a nice gentleman caller and maybe get married 'again.'

Sarah was also making plans in her head. She would go to the job interview that Dr. Zamboni had set up. It was in a couple of days and so she had time to get an entirely new wardrobe. She really had little choice in the matter anyway, she must have lost weight since all her professional clothing was too big for her. (She didn't consider that they were too long also.) She would get a professional looking haircut. She would cut her hair short like they did in the marines. She liked that look and it would project confidence as she was applying for a managerial position. Once she had a job, she would find an apartment. That might take a while, but she was determined to do it. In the mean time she hadn't remembered the last time she had a date, she would reenter the single scene. Eventually she would get married, but to start she just wanted feminine company. She was feeling particularly virile right now and she would probably start with some casual relationships. She needed to get laid in the worse way. Sarah had told her son about her plans, but she left the getting laid part out. The days of telling her mother everything were gone.
12431131.title: next

124311313.content:
After cleaning off the table, Ben logged onto the computer in the living room. He needed to learn the tips and tricks for putting on make-up. He thought he had just forgotten since he hadn't done it in such a long time. He started with the basics and then looked at videos which showed the more advanced techniques. He stuck to the basics, but every video he saw said that make-up started with foundation. You would never look as good as you could without putting on foundation first. It also said on the other hand that putting on too much foundation wasn't good either.

In the morning, Ben had to shave his face again and then he put on just enough foundation to hide any stubble that might appear. Ben resolved to have all the hair on his face removed by electrolysis. Then he used the techniques that he learned to put on the rest of his makeup. He had all the supplies, but not the right color for his skin tone. He would have to go to the dollar store and buy new make-up. It was best to buy it there because it was cheap and it might take a while to find what worked well on his face.

Once he was done, he made an appointment with the hair dressers. It was a good thing the appointment was in the afternoon, because he had to go to a shoe store first. Besides not being fashionable enough, none of his shoes fit him. He spent almost two hours looking over and buying new shoes for himself. The saleswoman looked at him oddly but Ben didn't mind. He actually enjoyed looking through the dozens of pairs of shoes he saw. He wanted something stylish, but nothing for old ladies or for young women. There was a balancing act in everything he selected. He didn't want to be an 'old lady' anymore, but that is no reason to dress like a 'kid' either.

He wanted his hair washed, colored and permed. He brought in a magazine article with a picture of what he wanted. The stylist said his hair was too short for that, but she said if they added extensions it she could make it work. Ben agreed. The hair doo took all day, but in the end he loved the look. There wasn't time to shop for a new wardrobe, but at least he could now walk around in properly fitting fashionable shoes and his hair was very pretty..
124311313.title: Day one for Ben

choices: One of Sarah's long time friends visits the house
1243113131.content:
Sarah thought that she must have lost a lot of weight since all her clothes seemed to be oversized. Not only that but the sleeves on her shirts were too long as well as the length of her pants. She had to make cuffs for them to fit and wear a belt to keep them from falling down. She brushed her hair back and left the house to find a new style. She wanted to have a very professional masculine look. She started with her hair which she cut very short in a marine style. Her hair was greying, but she thought the grey gave her a mature dignify look that she liked.

The haircut didn't take very long and soon she was looking for apparel. She started with boxer shorts. She thought that boxers were more mature than briefs. She never want to wear briefs again. Next she looked for shoes. Her old shoes much have stretched since they seemed too big for her feet. She bought dress shoes and loafers. All of her shoes had to have laces, she didn't want anything that slipped on at all. She also didn't want to wear any sneakers. She preferred loafers instead.

Once she found shoes she could walk in, she set out to find some suits for her interview. That was the most important thing right now. She bought several business suits. She would pick them up in a week as they had to be professionally fitted, but she did get one that was off the rack for her interview tomorrow. All of her shirts had to have buttons and collars even the casual shirts. The most casual of her shirts were polo shirts. Her socks had to be black, brown or dark blue. Everything she bought whether for business or for a more casual setting had to project a strong masculine no non-sense appearance.

The next day she met with Mr. Newton. Mr. Newton owned a chain of parking garages. He wanted someone to manage them. Sarah in her navy blue male business suit entered Mr. Newton's office. Mr. Newton was a girl about eight or nine years old. She was also wearing a suit, but not as expensive as the one Sarah was wearing. Mr. Newton owned the business, he didn't have to impress anyone. His hair was combed in a professional matter and he looked a bit haggard.

"Welcome," Mr. Newton said. "Dr. Zamboni recommends you quite highly."

"I think a great deal about Dr. Zamboni too. He is a great doctor."

Mr. Newton went over Sarah's qualifications, but it was all a formality. If Dr. Zamboni recommended her, then she must be good. Dr. Zamboni's opinion was highly respected by both of them. After the formal part of the interview was over and Sarah got the job, Mr. Newton started to tell Sarah about himself.

"My family and I were patients of Dr. Zamboni. I was working too hard. I wasn't spending enough time with my family. That is why I am hiring you. I want you to run the day to day operations of the business and report to me. I'll spend most of my time at home only coming in once a week or so. But I'll leave the heavy lifting to you."

"I am honored for you to have that much faith in me," Sarah said.

"Well you are certainly qualified. My wife has gone back to work and my daughter is in the third grade. I want to be home to drop her off at school and pick her up. They are the light of my life, want to see them?'

"Sure."

Mr. Newton took out a couple of picture from his wallet to show Sarah. "This is my wife at her new job."

Sarah looked at the picture and saw a slightly overweight woman in her early forties. She was wearing a micro-bikini and pasties and very high heels. Her face was covered in way too much make-up. "Your wife is very pretty," Sarah said.

"Yes thank you. She has been complaining about wanting to go back to work for some time now. After seeing Dr. Zamboni she has returned to work. She is a stripper at a club downtown. She just loves it. But she works late and that makes it hard for her to take our daughter to school in the morning. I'll do that. Want to see a picture of my daughter?"

"Yes."

Sarah looked at a picture that Mr. Newton said was his daughter. It was obviously one of those pictures that a school takes of it's students. The background was of a meadow. The figure in the picture was dressed in a white juvenile dress with puffed sleeves and a round neck. The subject of the picture was a man nearing fifty. His hair was parted in the middle with two pig tails hanging down in the back. He had a big toothy grin which showed not only his upper teeth, but his lower teeth also. He had a very slight five o'clock shadow.

"She is the love of my life," Mr. Newton said. "She is in the third grade and very smart."

"She looks just like you."

"Yes, she is daddy's little girl. I love her to death. I am going to spend much more time with her. Do you have any children?"

"No not yet, but I want children."

"Don't wait too long."

"I won't."

Mr. Newton told Sarah that she would start on Monday. The two said their goodbyes. Sarah left the office happy as a clam. That night, Sarah got dressed up and headed for a single's club. She was brimming with confidence after landing the job. She wanted to celebrate and if she found some female company to help her celebrate all the better.
1243113131.title: Meanwhile, Sarah was shopping

12431131313.content:
Sarah headed to the local single's bar called The Haven. It was a traditional meat market where young twenty somethings hung around and did what twenty somethings always did. Sarah was decked out with her hair cut short and wearing a navy colored dressed shirt and jeans. She headed for the bar and ordered a white wine spritzer. Even though she thought she was Ben she still had Sarah's taste in drinks.

She spotted a lovely young lass sitting alone at a table and Sarah thought this was a great chance to get to know her. Sarah cruised confidently over to the girl's table and introduced herself. "Hi I'm Ben." She said with a wide toothed grin. Unbeknownst to Sarah she was inclined to meet this particular person since they too had visited the good Dr. Z. It seems our medical professional has a very busy clientele.

"Hi I'm Jennifer." The obviously squeaky voice said. The quick back story is that John Wilson a 16 yr old and his 22 yr old sister were compelled to dress as one another. If any person talked to them they would assume the personality of the other person. The catch was that John's idea of how he sister acted was how he would act. Since he thought Jennifer was a ditz that's how John would act.

"Can I sit?' Sarah asked.

Meanwhile back with Ben

124311313131.content:
Ben went out the same night that Sarah did. Dr. Zamboni had phoned him and reminded him about the senior center that he was involved with. Ben thought it would be a great idea to meet some new people 'his own age' and so he got dressed up.

By now he had bought new apparel. He started with panty briefs with a marching bra. The bra was padded, but he stuffed additional panties in the cups to give him the illusion of a bigger cup size. Next he put on a padded panty-girdle to help his bottom shape too. Over that he wore nude pantyhose. Finally he decided upon a blouse with a matching skirt.

Putting make-up took him almost an hour. He wasn't confident in his abilities and sometimes had to wash off what he had and reapply it to get the look he wanted. He wasn't worried about looking sexy for his new friends, all he wanted to do was look presentable. He was getting better at his make-up application skills, but that would take time. Also he had started electrolysis on his face, but that would take many sessions until all trace of stubble would be gone. Until then he used more foundation than he should to keep this stubble hidden. He thought he looked pretty good considering, when he was done. The final steps were a purse with matching shoes and jewelry. The jewelry was the only parts of his outfit which he had own for several years, although he hadn't wore in much recently.

The senior center that Dr. Zamboni was referring to was actually the recreation room of a nursing home. Dr. Zamboni had taken control over the entire nursing home. He liked it because it was a closed place. There weren't many visitors and everyone who worked there had a fixed schedule. He could make any changes he wanted. The staff could be swapped with the patients. Men could be swapped with women? Visitors could come and stay as patients. he had total control over everyone and no one from the outside would suspect a thing. It was a perfect testing ground for the good doctor.

Ben arrived at the 'senior center.'
124311313131.title: Ben

1243113131313.content:
32 year old Rachel dreaded heading to work at the retirement home. As an orderly, her patients were rude and the whole place was just depressing. She hated the smell of piss and old people that seemed to permeate the whole building.

Rachel hadn't noticed she was dressing herself in overalls and putting her hair in pigtails. ‘I get paid this Friday. I just have to make it a few more days she thought to herself.’

Rachel failed to notice any of the strange looks she was getting on her walk over. As she approached the door of the retirement home, she noticed the 91 year old receptionist woman greet her with a smile.

As she walked through those doors, Rachel became filled with excitement. “Hi, lady!” She said to the receptionist. “I get to see Grandpa today!” Rachel was skipping and bouncing with uncontrollable energy.

“How lovely,” the receptionist said. “I will let him know you are here.”
Rachel sat at her usual chair and began to rock it back and forth. One of Rachel’s coworkers, Anthony, was busy working on his knitting and humming. Most of the other ‘patients’ were entranced by the movie that was playing.

Rachel waited excitedly in her seat. She couldn't wait to see her grandpa. They usually had so much fun when together. She had trouble waiting until one of the residents struck up a conversation.

"Here to see your poppie?" he asked.

"Yeah."

"My you are getting big how old are you? I sometimes forget?"

Rachel held up three fingers in her left hand and two on her right and announced, "I am five years old!"

I know he has been telling people you were going to come today. He was looking forward to it. I'm sure you will have so much fun with him."

Something had not been quite right since 22-year-old Jennifer left Zamboni’s office. She couldn’t believe she had to waste her time in therapy with her nerdy perverted brother, John. She planned for a day of shopping at the mall. Normally she would relish all eyes on her fine body but today seemed different. Walking without a bra and wearing her brother’s sweats didn’t seem out of the ordinary, but she was not getting the kind of attention she usually did.

When she entered the make-up department, she was greeted by an employee. “Hello, how can I help you today?”
Jennifer replied with a voice crack, “S-so sorry m’am, I must be in the wrong store.” ‘Wow she sure was attractive,’ Jennifer thought to herself. ‘Maybe I’ll fap to her later’

As Jennifer tried to locate the GameStop, she regained her sense of self not remembering what had happened.

Zamboni sat for awhile as he watched the family that was currently under his power. He chuckled to himself as an image of the George dressed like his wife flashed through his head. Oh my, zamboni thought that is what I will do, I will make them have a compulsion to wear each others clothes. First I must think of a trigger that sets the action in motion.

Ah-ha I got it. "George and shelly can you hear me?" the two adults shook their heads. "Listen to me carefully every night when your kids are in bed you two will become very horny.You will have passionate sex. The next morning you will each put on each others underwear. You will not notice the type of underwear you are wearing until you use the restroom. Then you will vow to remedy the problem but right when you are about to change you somehow forget too."

" You will continue to wear each others underwear until the next session we have in two weeks Do you understand?"

The couple nodded their heads. Then he looked over at Jake and cyndi " starting tonight you two will feel the need to go to bed at 8:00. Before you go to bed you will each visit the others room and swap pajamas. When you wake up you both will feel very embarrassed at what you are wearing, and be unable to explain why you ate dressed that way. Then the next day you will continue to do it until our next session in two weeks. Do you understand?"

The two teenagers nodded their heads. " ok when I count three everyone will wake up refreshed and happy. 1-2-3"

Everyone blinked their eyes and stretched. "Well I think we made some great strides." zamboni said. "I think we should meet again in two weeks to measure our progress." zamboni smiled at the family.

Dr Zamboni was finishing up with George, Shelly and their family. He was sitting in his oversized lounge chair that was facing the others while he was conducting his hypnosis. The suggerstion was planted and everyone had come too, when his intercom busser went off and his receptionist Julia informed him that his next appointment was here. Everyone rose to their feets and Shelly extended her hand to thank the Dr on his time and she informed him that they would likely return in a week. Zamboni told them to make arrangements with Julia and wished them well.

The door closed to the heavly dark wooden panelled room, and Zamboni return to his desk to check his appointment book. He noticed that the name Banks Family was written, so he told his receptionist through the intercom to send in the Banks family. Julia replyed the they had cancelled and in their place was a young couple who had just walked in and the woman was really emotional and wondered if Dr. Zamboni would have some time to help them. Dr. Zamboni told Julia that to send them in and he got up to receive them at the door.

Paula was the first to enter with her fiance Tom a step behind. Paula was dressed in dark denim strech jeans with a flowy flower printed chifon blouse. On her feet was a pair of flat brown riding boots. She wore a black short jacket and had a scarf wrapped around her neck. She had redish brown long hair and wore her sunglasses on top of her head in order to keep her hair tucked behind her ears. Tom had followed her into the room, he was a year older at 26 and had a similar build to his fiance Paula. He stood an inch and half taller than Paula and was slender for a man. He wore a black blazer over a green t-shirt, and faded jeans and a pair of addida retro sneakers on his feet.

They exchanged hand shakes with one another in the center of the room before Zamboni offered them a seat to discuss why they were here. The words had just left Zamboni's lips when Paula started to ramble about Tom and his lack of understanding about her, her family and their upcoming wedding. The more she talked the more animated she got and the more upset she became. Tom and her would be married in less than two weeks and she wasn't sure that she could go through with it knowing that Tom didn't understand what this day meant to her. She continued telling the Dr that she had looked forward to this day since she was a little girl and it seemed that Tom just didn't care. Meanwhile Tom sat slumped down in the sofa beside Paula and didn't say much but his body language spoke volumes to Zamboni.

1321111.content:
It was about 10 minutes later when with the disagreement mostly over, Tom headed into the front room of the condo. He sat down on the couch and was about to pull out his sports illustrated when the phone rang. Tom stood as if to go answer it when he saw Paula trudge into the kitchen to get the cordless phone.

"Hello" Paula said speaking into the phone. Tom noticed that Paula had changed into his no that's not right her boxer shorts. God that woman really has no idea or sense of style thought Tom. What a bohemian to traipses around in ones underwear.

Tom sat back down and opened his magazine. He kept one ear open to hear Paula's conversation. As Tom was reading he admired the cute ballet flats that were on his feet. Tom could hear Paula saying, "Aw mom you really think it's going to take 2hours?" Tom did a slight cough at hearing that. Doesn't she realize how important a bridal dress is? Tom turned and glanced at Paula. She is so silly not to realize how lucky she is.

Then Tom heard Paula say," I don't know..white I guess. What? I didnt realize there was so many shades of white." Tom was beginning to become very upset plus hus sports magazine did not seem so interesting any more. He placed his magazine neatly into the magazine rack and walked into the kitchen. He enjoyed the sound his ballet flats made as he walked across the floor.

As he entered the kitchen he noticed Paula had pulled a chair from the dinning room and was sitting in it. She had her legs spread and was scratching her stomach with her shirt pulled up. Tom walked over to her and put nothin hands on his hips. "Tell your mother to hold on." Paula looked up at him then said ," Mom hold on Tom has something to tell me." Tom glared at her and said. Then Paula handed the phone to Tom and she went into the front room and sat down and turned on the the TV. Tom held the phone to his ear and spoke to his soon to be mother-in-law. " Hey, darlene." "Yes this is tom. Look I will make sure Paula is ready. No everything is fine we just came back from visiting a therapist." before long Tom was on the phone with Paula's mom for about 45 minutes. When he hung up he had a determination to make sure Paula was ready.

He walked into their bedroom went over to Paula's side of the bed and pulled out all of her bridal magazines. Two things occurred to him. One he never spoke with Darlene all that much and he just spent forty five minutes on the phone with her. And two his wife would be the most beautiful bride ever.

Tom walked into the front room he turned off the television and plopped all of Paula's magazines on the coffee table. Paula groaned,"Aw man"

13211111.content:
Paula was not in the mood to look at wedding magazines. It wasn't that she was bored with the details, she just no longer thought that the dress was a big deal. Zamboni spoke with Earl for several more minutes. "Lisa, is it okay if I bring your Daddy in so the three of us can talk?" he asked the man in the pink dress.

Earl became sullen, but agreed. Zamboni excused himself and the room to retrieve Lisa, who was still flirting with George in the outer office. He opened the door, clearing his throat to announce his presence. "Earl, would you join us, please" he asked.

"Sure thing, Doc. I'll, uh, see you in a few, darling'" Lisa said to George, as she headed toward the door.

"I'll be here" George giggled, watching as the girl marched away.

Zamboni held the door open, standing to the side to allow Lisa to pass, closing it once she entered. He ushered the girl to the couch, where she planted herself next to Earl. As soon as they were seated, Zamboni spoke the trigger word, causing the pair to fall into a trance. He gave the pair a few suggestions, and brought them out of their trance.

"That's our time for today. I'll see you same time tomorrow" Zamboni said, as Lisa and Earl blinked a few times before getting off the couch.

"Ok, Doc. We'll see you tomorrow, Right honey? Thank Doctor Zamboni for his help" Lisa said, as she looked up at Earl.

"Thank you, Doctor Zamboni" Earl parroted, in a sing-song tone, as they exited to the office.

"Same time tomorrow, Carry" Zamboni said.

"Yes, Doctor" George replied.

On the couch sat a woman and two children, a boy,15, who wore a white silk blouse that showed the silhouette of a bra underneath, a fine gold chain around his neck, with several bangles on one arm and a ladies watch adorning his wrist, along with a pair of board shorts and sneakers, and a girl 12, who wore a floral print t-shirt with the outline of a training bra beneath, a black knit skirt and 4" black pumps. The woman wore a black t-shirt with a skull screen-printed on it, a denim skirt and flip-flips.

"Ah... Mrs. Carson. You and the children, please come in" he said, greeting his next patients.

The boy picked up the purse at his side. He and the girl rose to their feet, the girl brushing out the skirt. They turned to the woman and said in unison, "Let's go you two". The woman stumbled, while getting off the couch. "Cut it out, Billy" she said, then replied on the same breath "I didn't do anything"

"Both of you knock it off and get in there" the children huffed in an exasperated tone, pushing the woman along into the office.

Once home, Lisa gave Earl some crayons to color with. She saw a blinking light on the answering machine and played the message, causing the pair to instantly fall into a trance. They got up and mechanically walked to their respective bedrooms where each retrieved a device Zamboni had given them on their previous visit. Returning to the couch, each took the other's device, placed the ear buds in and listened.

Zamboni had allowed them to access their complete memories, inner most thoughts and secrets they would never tell anyone, which they had recorded for the other to listen to. The trance they were currently under, would allow them to make that information their own. The pair sat still, as the voices they perceived as their own told them about their lives.

Among the things Earl learned were the names of his classmates, especially the boy he liked and which girls he didn't get along, which dress was his absolute favorite, where he hid his Halloween candy so his Daddy wouldn't find it and the aunt he liked so much because she always let him play dress-up when she babysat him. Likewise, Lisa found out who her drinking buddies were, how she loved to lift weights, what her favorite beer was and the names of all the women she dated before meeting her mother, along with the details of her wedding night and the moment she found out w=she would be a father.

Grabbing her keys, phone and wallet, she headed out of her bedroom. "Ready, Princess?" Lisa asked Earl, who blushed at being called that.

"You look beautiful today, Princess" she said," I love you very much"

"I love you too, Daddy" Earl replied, as he took her hand and left the house.

They walked out to the car, where Lisa helped Earl into his car seat in the back. She struggled to belt him in. "You are getting so big" she said, at which he giggled. Lisa nuzzled his neck, kissed him on the cheek and closed the door.

She got into the driver’s seat, which was up as far as it could go. Her tiny feet could barely reach the pedals, but she managed. The car pulled out of the driveway and onto the street, for the 10 minute drive to the doctor's office.

“I really like Doctor Zamboni” Earl said from the back seat.

“Really... Why?” Lisa asked.

“’Cause he’s helping us and he’s nice and I really like him” Earl said.

“Is that why you’re dressed so pretty today” Lisa asked, looking into the rearview mirror at Earl.

“Maybe” Earl replied, blushing.

They continued to drive along, oblivious to the stares they received. At a red light, one woman did a triple take, as she gasped, seeing a grown man in a dress, packed into a child's car seat, while a young girl wearing a dress shirt and tie operated the car.They drove a few more minutes, before Earl asked “Daddy… do you like Carry?”

“Yes, honey, she’s nice” Lisa said, turning the wheel in her tiny hands, as she turned the corner.

“Are you gonna marry her?” he asked.

“Wh..What? Why would you think that?” she asked, choking a bit.

”Cause you’re dressed so nice and smell good.” Earl stated.

Thinking for a moment, Lisa replied, “Well, I like her, but I don’t know if we’d get married, at least not right away. We haven’t even gone out on a date yet”

“Daddy, I think you should marry her. She’s nice and I like her a lot, too, and maybe I can marry Doctor Zamboni and you can marry Carry and then we can be all married together and live in a big house and do stuff together all the time” Earl advised.

Lisa laughed. “Let’s see how the first date goes, okay Sweety?”

“Okay, Daddy, but can I still marry Doctor Zamboni” he asked.

Lisa pulled into the parking lot. “We’ll see, baby girl, let's just get through today's appointment first, okay?”, she said, turning off the engine and exiting the car.

"Okay, Daddy" Earl replied.

Lisa got Earl out of his car seat, locked the car doors and they walked toward the building. Lisa struggled to pull the door open, but managed. Earl ran into the lobby. ”Can I push the button?’ He asked, standing by the elevator.

“Go ahead” Lisa replied, as Earl clapped his hands with glee before pushing the elevator call button.

They got in and the doors closed. Earl looked down at Lisa, who smiled back up at him. Lisa nodded her head. He giggled as he pressed the floor button. Lisa thought about how it was the smallest things that made her daughter happy. The doors opened and the pair got out. Lisa could feel her hands sweat a little bit, and her chest pound harder as they were about to open the door. She knew Carry was just on the other side. Earl quickly opened the door and ran in, greeting the woman, “Hi Carry…”

“Terri… Michael?” Tom asked, looking quizzically at his wife and son.

Terri, who sat with her legs spread open looked at her husband, “Good, you made it. We can finally get this session over with. I’m bored out of my mind here.”

“I told you about this. I was talking to Mary Sternberger. She said this guy really helped her son, Larry so we were coming in to see if Doctor Zamboni could offer some help with Michael’s grades. He needs to keep them up if he’s going to get that football scholarship” Terri asked.

He’s supposedly even been seeing some of the old guys from the VFW, like, dating and I heard he’s even sleeping with few of them”

She’s even got a bunch of tattoos. I even heard she’s got herself a girlfriend, some bimbo from the hair salon with really big boobs” Brittany explained.

He must think it's serious." Terri said, pulling at her jersey, as she got angry with her husband's seeming lack of concern for their son's future.

“Please calm down. We’re here to talk about things and see if we can resolve the matters at hand with some degree of mutual understanding. Now, in order to create a peaceful environment, I’d like you all to take a few deep breaths and turn your attention to this watch.” Zamboni asked.

After listening to the Jameson’s express their concerns while under hypnosis, it came to light that Tom and Teri both felt Brittany, while being a nice, friendly and intelligent young woman, was bad for their son as he had become preoccupied with her to the detriment of his grades by staying out past curfew or hanging out most weeknights instead of concentrating on his studies.

Zamboni found out a few facts about the Jameson's:

Teri owned a local boutique and Tom was vice president of a bank nearby. Both had gone to good schools and wanted their son to become successful, as well. They were upstanding citizens and good neighbors, involved on their son’s activities and with the exception of some experimentation in college, neither had any real vices except for a few drinks with friends.

After digging deeper into their subconscious, they admitted:

Tom admitted to being a bit homophobic, flirting with a few women at the bank, watching porn when his wife was out of the house and secretly wishing to return to his childhood. Teri admitted to secretly having a dominate streak, but only acting on it outside her marriage engaging in B&D and D/s with her trusted friends on girls night. She had a shoe fetish, loving the way she looked in heels and also having a ‘thing’ for one of the neighbor’s husbands, but never acting on it.

Michael wished his parents would stop nagging him. He secretly hated playing sports and only did it because his parents pushed him into it. Since he had to play, he didn’t think it was a big deal that his grades had dropped a bit, especially since he was a star on the football team and dating a cheerleader, not to mention, one of the hottest girls in school. He admitted he was still a virgin and that they hadn’t gone all the way yet, but they had fooled around quite a bit. She felt guilty about it, but doubted it would last beyond graduation, and while “technically” she hadn’t lost her virginity, she had given oral to a few other guys. She hated all the clothes and make-up, acting peppy and girly as she actually preferred females, as she had been sexually active with a few of her girlfriends, some of them on the cheerleading squad. Her favorite times were when she was going down on one of them or when it was her turn to wear the strap-on.

Shelly you will get the rooms accents. Get a rug, bed linen, curtains and wallpaper in a style for toddlers.

Jake you will come home everyday right after school and wait for the stuff to be delivered. You will place the furniture around the room, hang the curtains and put up the wallpaper.

Cyndi your dad will give you money and you will go everyday to drug stores and buy baby supplies. You must buy diapers (Zamboni explained which sizes), bottles, baby food, pacifiers, bibs, toys for toddlers and anything you think babies need."

Zamboni then had a decision to make, who should he give this final assignment too. But there was only one choice, "Shelly your body will start producing milk." This would take some time, her brain would tell her body to produce hormones. The body does anything the brain tells it. It wouldn't happen over night but soon, Shelly breasts would be producing milk. Cyndi really couldn't do it, at 11 she hadn't started puberty yet.

"You will all return in two weeks. You are happy, you all feel like you are finally doing something to help."
151.title: The first step in Zamboni's plan

choices: The Clarks at home watching TV
1511.content:
With everyone working together, getting the room in shape didn't take long. George bought the furniture. It was no big deal to pick out the stuff, it was all the same to him. The woman's touch came from the accents and that was Shelly's job. Jake was a strong back and put the room together and hung the curtains and the wall paper. Cyndi wasn't embarrassed in the least to buy all the baby stuff. It took several days (as Zamboni expected) but she got it all little by little. In two weeks the room was ready.

But it takes more than two weeks to start producing milk, so they weren't totally ready when they visited Zamboni. Zamboni then gave them some more commands. "You all must spend at least two hours a day watching Nick Jr together." Nick Jr has programming for the youngest children. "You will all enjoy the closeness of being together as a family."

"George, Jake and Cyndi when you get stressed, you will find that putting your thumb in your mouth and sucking very soothing.

Come back in two weeks."
1511.title: The Clarks return in two weeks

choices: The authorities visit the home wondering why Cyndi hasn't been in school
15112.content:
Two weeks went by fast. Shelly was ready to breast feed. Now was the time to finalize the plan.

Zamboni told the Clarks, "Home is where you want to be as often as possible. When you are at home George, Jake and Cyndi you will forger everything you have learns since you had been 18 months old. Shelly will not only be your mommy but she will be your world. Everything you get is from her. You will have complete love and trust in Shelly. Shelly for you it will be like having toddler triplets. You will take care of them and love them. You are now one big happy family." Zamboni was satisfied with what he did. He had helped the family. Nothing is better than a mother and her loving children.
15112.title: Skip ahead two weeks

choices: Realization dawns on the family when the priest says a certain word
154.content:
Zamboni had the family send invitations to their closest friends. They planned everything together. All the family members were at every meeting with the caterer, the dj and the priest. This was going to be a total group event.

On that special day, all of the guests were seated in the large hall. A buzz was heard from the guests as they anxiously waited. Soon the music started and everyone looked to the back of the room. There stood Shelly and George. Shelly wore a handsome blue pin-striped suit. She wore a white button down shirt and a blue tie. She work dark blue socks and black oxford shoes. Even though she didn't wear any makeup she did look very good.

George had on a full length strapless junior dress with a matching belt at natural waist and subtle high-low hem which showcased his hairy legs. It had a pleated skirt and a straight neckline that was fitted to stay up on the flat chest of a younger girl. On his feet he wore light tan ballet flats. The only makeup he wore was a hint of blush and pale pink lipstick.

Shelly and George walked down the isle in unison. First the right foot then feet together, then the left foot and then feet together again until the yreachesd the stage. Then they split off with one moving to the left and the other moving to the right.

Cyndi was next. She was dressed in a tuxedo. She was very dapper looking with her ruffled shirt and bow-tie. She also wore oxford shoes on her feet similar to those that Shelly wore. Once she got to the stage, she took her place by her mother, in front of the priest.

Then the music changed to "Here Comes The Bride" and Jack appeared. He looked elegant in his thin spaghetti strapped wedding dress with draped chiffon bodice and full tulle ballerina skirt. Feathered flowery details were at the waist. A long cathedral train trailed behind him. With his hair done up elegantly and his flawless makeup only the people who knew him, knew he was a boy not a woman. There was a broad smile on his face, he felt like the luckiest woman in the world on her wedding day. He slowly glided down the aisle towards the priest.

The crowd was too shocked and embarrassed to say anything. A pin could be heard in the hall as the priest began, "Dearly beloved we are gathered here to...."
154.title: Renew vows

info.brief_description: Zamboni is an old hypnotist with a flare.
info.description:
Zamboni is a hypnotist. He has gotten a license to practice family therapy. He leaves subliminal messages that have certain family members do

certain things. For example, Maybe a mother starts to act like her teenage son when he says the word cheese. Please add and be creative. If you are only going to add one or two sentences please go somewhere else. Other than that have fun.
